abstracts.cdata!:
The primary objective of the project is
            to provide the Government of Bangladesh (GOB) with
            continuing, flexible funding for the preparation of
            investment projects in general, and more specifically, for
            that part related to IDA's lending program. Secondly,
            the project will provide support to GOB in strengthening key
            agencies responsible for implementation of investment
            projects. Thirdly, the project would contribute to the
            attainment of a sound investment program through financing
            of training and the undertaking of related technical
            assistance activities identified by GOB. The project will
            finance technical assistance for (a) project preparation,
            (b) implementation support for IDA-financed investment
            projects, (c) institutional strengthening, (d) studies, and
            (e) other technical assistance activities related to
            IDA's program in Bangladesh. As was the case with
            previous IDA financed technical assistance projects in
            Bangladesh, approximately one half of the technical
            assistance subprojects will be for project preparation, one
            third for institutional development, and the rest for other
            types of technical assistance.
